title: Augmented Reality-Based Natural Science Inquiry Project: Math Modeling Using Mindtools

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: In-service teacher re-education program for office/administrative workers, enhancing competencies to develop AR-integrated mathematics content applicable to elementary science classes.

learning_goals: Learners will select three natural science phenomena (e.g., waves, gravity) in an AR environment (e.g., Unity MARS, ZapWorks), design mathematical models (differential equations, simulation algorithms, etc.) for each phenomenon, create a project plan (including objectives, methodology, evaluation criteria), and implement a prototype executable within six months.
Designing learner-led knowledge construction processes using mindtool-based AR systems
Developing AR-integrated math educational materials applying multisensory information integration and cognitive load management strategies
Completing final outputs through peer feedback and iterative improvements in PBL processes
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
